titles.title: Smart Cities and Communities Act of 2024
Smart Cities and Communities Act of 2024
To promote the use of smart technologies and systems in communities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Science, Space, and Technology, Education and the Workforce, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
